# Resources

## Software Packages

### Exapnsive packages
* [QIIME](http://qiime.org)
* [QIIME 2](https://qiime2.org)
* [Mothur](https://www.mothur.org)
* [PhyloSeq](https://joey711.github.io/phyloseq/)

### R Libraries
* [vegan](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/vegan/index.html)
* [tidyverse](http://tidyverse.org) includes ggplot2, dplyr and many others
* [DeSeq2](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/DESeq2.html)
* [randomForest](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/DESeq2.html)


## Web sites

Michelle Berry's (@mich_berr) wonderful tutorial on using PhyloSeq and R for Community Diversity Analysis: [Microbial Community Diversity Analysis Tutorial with Phyloseq](http://deneflab.github.io/MicrobeMiseq/demos/mothur_2_phyloseq.html)


## Regular Courses/Workshops

[Workshop on Genomics](http://evomics.org). Held annually in the Czech Republic.

[QIIME Workshops](https://workshops.qiime.org)

[EDAMAME](http://www.edamamecourse.org/docs/index.html). Course and Extensive On-line Materials. Organzied in 2014 and 2015.

[STAMPS](https://stamps.mbl.edu). Held annually at the Woods Hole Marine Biological Laboratory.



## Books

[Numerical Ecology](https://www.elsevier.com/books/numerical-ecology/legendre/978-0-444-53868-0?start_rank=1&sortby=sortByDateDesc&cat0=environmental-science&cat1=ecology&cat2=statistical-ecology). P. Legendre and Loic Legendre. eBook ISBN: 9780444538697. Paperback ISBN: 9780444538680
